metadata.title: CVE-2011-1412 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: sys/sys_unix.c in the ioQuake3 engine on Unix and Linux, as used in World of Padman 1.5.x before 1.5.1.1 and OpenArena 0.8.x-15 and 0.8.x-16, allows remote game servers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in a long fs_game variable.

criterions.comment: openarena package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
